title: Mexico’s president has ‘excellent’ talk with Trump, dismisses tariff threat
description: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum spoke to President-elect Donald Trump after he threatened to impose tariffs and she hinted at retaliation in a letter.
author: Mary Beth Sheridan, Niha Masih
excerpt: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum spoke to President-elect Donald Trump after he threatened to impose tariffs and she hinted at retaliation in a letter.
text: MEXICO CITY — Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum and President-elect Donald Trump agreed in a phone call that their countries will have a “good relationship,” she said Thursday, and she dismissed his threat to impose a 25 percent tariff on Mexico’s exports if it didn’t stop the flow of migrants and fentanyl to the United States.
html: MEXICO CITY — Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum and President-elect Donald Trump agreed in a phone call that their countries will have a “good relationship,” she said Thursday, and she dismissed his threat to impose a 25 percent tariff on Mexico’s exports if it didn’t stop the flow of migrants and fentanyl to the United States.
